message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $18000 for it, but I'm open to negotiation.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $14000 is a good offer, I'm hoping to get closer to $16000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $15000? I'm confident this product will be a great investment for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $14500. Can you consider that?
